column4: can anyone clue me in as to why my wireless keyboard/mouse are lagging horribly when i've got a lot of internet activity?
c0LD, are you sure your monitor is not going bad?
can anyone clue me in as to why my wireless keyboard/mouse are lagging horribly when i've got a lot of internet activity?
quite sure -- it's a fairly new (and expensive) viewsonic flatscreen :) -- doesn't ever do this in other operating systems
